alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero County through 715 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Fowler to near Higbee. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Swink, Higbee and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
